page.title: 18CHOIR AND CHUCH
page.content: Five children from this school are in the church{choir,}there are between fifteen and twenty people in the church choir altogether. I joined the{choir}not long ago, I've had some robes. They are red with a diamond shaped hat, the collar is a piece of meterial made in a fan shape which clips on with poppers and we have sleeves that can slide up your arms. The{choir}practice is every Thursday evening, we learn something new at the practice, we learn to follow music by singing high and low and we are kept in order well. We have {choir}practice so that we will sing well on the following Sunday, sometimes the player plays either the organ or piano at the practice. Just before eleven o clock on Sunday we line up and the vicar says a prayer
